attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-Mp7ZYLKzw1I3YBChEYT_description
attribs.current: If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-Mp7ZYLLArV0cOt93DTq_description
attribs.current: The macoyii has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-Mp7ZYLLArV0cOt93DTr_description
attribs.current: The macoyii has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the macoyii's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-Mp7ZYLLArV0cOt93DTs_description
attribs.current: The macoyii has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in forest terrain.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-Mp7bkyprZzzJUdHBntC_description
attribs.current: The macoyii has the ability to perfectly mimic the sound of any creature it was able to overhear, but only up to two creatures at a time.
